issue.title: [C++] rewrite cpp/README shorter, with a separate contribution guide
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4339](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4339). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The README.md for the cpp project has grown long and contains a lot of information specific to contributors. Move this information into a separate CONTRIBUTING.md

In particular, draw more attention to the cmake option `-DBUILD_WARNING_LEVEL=CHECKIN` which is used in Travis and includes `-Werror`

comments.body:
